title: En teh chhandamna kawl eng saw
lyrics:
En teh, chhandamna kawl eng saw,
A tuam vel e, lei hmun tinreng;
Mahse, i unau tam takte,
Zan thim hnuaiah an la leng si.

Kal la, entir rawh, kal la, entir rawh,
Zan thim hnuaiah an la leng si.

Ngai teh, lungngaia au thawm chuan,
"MIn chhan rawh," tiin an au che;
Lalpa theihna ring tlat zelin,
an boral hma hian chhanhim rawh.

En teh, boral chhung zing hnuaiah,
Inthawi, zu ruih, saruak nenin;
An hre lo hmangaih chhandam thu,
Kal la, hmangaih thutiam hrilh rawh.

Lal lo kal hun a hnai ta e.
Engah kan leng, kan nghakhlel hle;
Mahse, en teh, ram htim, ram ro,
An lainatawm em, entir rawh.

Hmangaih Lalpan a dil mek che,
I neih thil leh chakna nenin;
Te tham te pawh rawn hlan mai la,
Lal lawmman hlu i tan a ni.
